fn.p: Conflict of interest statement: The authors declare no competing financial interests.

Accession numbers: All sequences reported in this study have been deposited in the GenBank nucleotide database under accession numbers KC164869 to KC164982 ( Eidolon helvum cytochrome b mtDNA) and JX870901 to JX870903 (paramyxovirus polymerase gene sequences from E. helvum urine).
